text: ejana raachula, yiye tomalokara ocarata allahara suspasta ayatasamuha tilaraata karae, yate se'isakala lokaka andhakarara paraa poharalai uliya'i aniba parae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche; arau yiye allahara oparata imana aniba arau satkama karaiba te'om taka jannatata praraesa karaaba, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata sihamta cirakala arasthana karaiba. Niscaya allahe taka uttama jiraika pradana karaiba
